channel.title: wordpress on An old coder
channel.description: Recent content in wordpress on An old coder

item.title: Using Hugo
item.description: Hugo is a considerably different writing process than using a CMS like Wordpress1. You can’t use Wordpress on a server that isn’t configured to serve dynamic content. It is interesting that I have gone from doing work that required a server instance with php or ColdFusion as well as a database to building apps and a CMS that are served from static HTML. You also lose control over your content with Wordpress even if you run your own server or VPS.
